alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 07 at 10:50AM PDT until May 08 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches above 1500 feet. Expect up to four inches above 2000 feet. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon
